attributes.action: Stop holiday companies putting prices up so much over school holiday times.
attributes.additional_details:
Surely if holiday companies kept their prices down more people would book the holidays and therefore they would still make as much money, but out of the many, not the few.

for evidence and/or references, check out any holiday website and book a holiday for 1 week in the summer not in school holiday time and 1 week in school holiday time and see the difference.

eg. Center Parc's 2 adults 2 children
In school holiday time £1149
Out of school holiday time £629
attributes.background:
Parents with children deserve a holiday at a reasonable price too.
It is unfair that holiday companies put their prices up so much during school holiday times, which in turn is causing children to miss out on fun, travel and educational experiences with their families.
